modName: Thieves Guild Bracer to Steel Gauntlet
summary: These files simply replaces the Thieves Guild Bracer\'s textures (male only) to the Steel Gauntlet\'s to match TheFPSmachine\'s \"Rise of the Thieves Guild\" armor.
descriptionHtml:
These files simply replaces the Thieves Guild Bracer\'s textures (male only) to the Steel Gauntlet\'s to match TheFPSmachine\'s \"Rise of the Thieves Guild\" armor.

To get the armor, you must download it from http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1686
and download \"ThiefArmor-Updated_1 - v1.1 - Slight armor color alteration - 01:28, 27 November 2011 - 711kb size.\"
author: jdc5490

files.name: Replaces Thieves Guild Bracer with Steel Gauntlet male only
files.fileName: Replaces Thieves Guild Bracer with Steel Gauntlet male only-2134-Final.rar
